twitch_info.title: I Wanna Tourney - Week #13
twitch_info.description: this game was loads of fun

message.body: qtFruity1 subscribed with Prime. They've subscribed for 8 months, currently on a 3 month streak! clear
this gives me ocean princess vibes and i'm all for it
time for max to panic after each death
this looks like a banger so far
I'm looking forward to seeing you analyze every room for an hour
it took me 4 hours so yeah
is the stream lagging only for me?
mastermaxify and the curse of dropped frames
did you perhaps anger a witch?
also yea frames are no longer dropping
the last part is rng too!
Ah, so you decided to move the 50 shades of grey reading to your stream, so that everyone can enjoy it
it's probably mini to kurath because he knows what to do
okay you already went to an area I haven't been to lol
I love ori don't get me wrong
but as a lava area pick
idk if it works as well
would fit more for an air type beat
max having some real trust issues
great i now have an urge to replay ori
so we don't all have to
Yes you normally have to unlock them by reaching them lol
but its funny to max... him
Goodbye frames i will miss you
but you did for a second
i was randomly dropping frames too it's fine I think
max you're not lagging, you're unlocking the power of time travel
wow this is Quite a solution
that is the best solution tbh
bruh there's a sound in the background of this song that sounds like my doorbell
i feel like despite the fact he rarely makes his own assets, kurath's visual style is so recognisable
the choice of yoinky sploinky sources is consistent
p sure that previous area is like, visually exactly the same as op
backup save is probably illegal due to deathctime
Why would it be a bad idea max please elaborate
it will probably be clear when or if you can do this
The ellipses would not be sufficient in such a case
I'd have to bring out the interrobang
i guess is gonna be a powerup for walking on lava
I did but im on phone ill oblige later
You took them back off lol
there is a Really Based here
he broke the chinese pathing jump
I find the music choice for the trials kinda funny
you know that game can have like 50 hours worth of gameplay on a soundtrack of like 10 songs
this was quite the moment to watch
That jump is about 50 times easier if you put it lower first since you have more water to glide down in
when you're offered 2 buttons it may be wise not to ignore 1 of them
don't cry to me if it turns out to be a critical mistake that would cost you top 3
you're not getting first place in this one anyway
Yea that‚Äôs what you do in real life
i just wanted to pass by, hf with the tourney games
i'll play this when i have time
what the hell is this lol
not denying that, especially with the RoR2 music lol
humans were made to multitask after all
WOW< you cleared that faster than you should have probably
you did that one so much faster than the second one lol
max check general in your server real quick
chilly peaks is what I call my nipples in winter
I had the max... written already üòî
In my head there I was like Max no.
rly hope alexbrogan is gonna try experimenting with this
noooo why is it +99 and not +254 I can't believe you kurath
no way, is this master the maxify?
a riddle for the ages, truly
this is giving me namtg secret vibes
just realized these statues are in cn3 hub
now this is a kurath gimmick
this fucker rly never played jetpack joyride
this seems like one of the gimmicks that will singlehandedly dictate the top 3 in the leaderboard
why did you do it like that
this gimmick is a hell of a wake up
just jump and then use rocket
I didn't finish the game shut up
maybe don't make fun of max then :)
@mastermaxify I have an important life or death question
you did a very small skip on the last save, which is why you got ???
wtf air is so busted powerup wise
the one thing you can't float through
for someone who quotes a squishy hero a lot this guy is tanky af
hows it been going, i can only surmise its been interesting based on the strats there
it's ok, solving puzzles doesn't involve much dying usually
idk if explaining how this type of clockwork is help or not lol
Maybe is some type ir clock with 12 hours, 12 on day and 12 on night. (I know this is obious but I have to say it...)
Max doesn't know how the noonday sun is supposed to look like due to living in Britain for so long üòî
I wonder how the people can create such puzzles like this...
did you note down the 4 clues
Wait so have you sorted out all 16 clocks?
I Hope this Will calm you a little
Taprus_ subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 6 months, currently on a 6 month streak! I thought I saw a car with 254 on its registration plate, buat it was actually 245, I was devastated
holy smokes it's mastermaxify i think
Did you did the "Do Hand exercices" because if you did It, I didn't Saw It, sorry.
he calls it exercise but it's just stretches
where are you getting these numbers from?
This music is from..Ori and the Blind Forest?
Nice. I never played through it all, but recognized the theme. Old computer was shiiiit and could not handle it, and have yet to play it on the new one.
this is just how these clocks work irl
I mean, at noon the sun is highest in the sky
This looks like it'd be really fun to speedrun if you know how everything works lol
there's some fun skips if kurath doesn't patch them
kurath isn't really someone who would patch skips unless they're absolutely massive
i found a teleporter bug that allowed me to go from fire teleporter to water teleporter without ever visiting water
and flav found a way to skip 3 bosses
you can use various abilities to skip all but the chilly peaks boss
guess this counts as absolutely massive then?
yo max can you explain why you have a clip with 100k views?
you can ghost through the lava which allows you to get fire item, you can use air in the screen to the right here to skip water item
and you can use air in grassy to skip grassy boss as well
idk what any of this means
it got over 2 million views on tiktok
how long ago did we meet
oh, that's a fancy looking room
aight i‚Äôm at work i gtg, just wanted to stop in
these tourney games seem pretty long
Wait so is that one literal invincibility until you hit the gorund?
most of the long ones get the entire week to themselves
how is the progress mr maxify?
yeah you're invinicible and have slow fall until ground
ah I see, still seems super powerful for skips
yeah you can use it to skip a boss
if you hold off on doing bosses
gust is def not the powerup I'd have picked lol

in regards to the skip fixing thing, the only one that was unexpected was how easy the water boss skip was, i do think in general the boss skips haven't been so obvious that i'm super worried about it but i'm considering closing one of them just to balance out the amount of bosses that have to be done
this is an unprecedented level of shamble
Wait, that does mean that this fangame is incomplete?
bro i thought those two spikes to the right was a k3 crystal i am tired
YOU FORGOT WHICH CLOCKS YOU ALREADY USED
HOW IS THAT NOT PEAK SHAMBLAGE
wait so is this week based on deaths or time @Mastermaxify
its an adventure game so clearly cosmo is going to do it in like 100 deaths
you literally destroyed each low death tourney game
games also super lenient on deaths since resetting doesn't count and multitask doesn't count
oh so it was supposed to be like that
i thought the multitask was a bug
uh it might count if you actually let the cutscene play out
it wasn't really intentional, but it was intentionally not changed
it was already a major point of concern for mental distress, so didn't need to compound it
is this cn3 yellow water btw
so how do the abilities work? Can you chain them together or only use one between each time you touch the ground
you can only use boots on the ground, the gust requires a double jump and uses it
not entirely sure, but its just negative vspeed acceleration without cap
cn3 def has a cap so it's Not That
ghost prevents you from doing anything but floating
the ultimate puzzle: making people use analog
trails of cold steel music catJAM
that part is really hard for some reason
yeah that last bit owned me hard
you say that but i feel like i haven't had a consistent final stage design
although vorm does have more information than most
this is a gimmick of all time
I think upside down from left yo right
I hate how this sound became ingrained as the "save on debug" sound
I can let him play and laugh at the same time though lol
this iron boots gimmick is wild
how is he this built different
right but when you laugh at him while he's playing it you're telling him there's an easier strat
but when its so obvious its kinda hard not to
max did you disable point gain on the channel or twitch just decided to fuck me up in particular?
Dude, this song is a banger.
i like how the save is upside down to help you figure out how to get it, nice
was the visual theme of this stage inspired by run the marathon final stage?
How yo destroy your neck: The game
for the most part, its mostly just recycled from ponder, from the theme in that that was inspired by marathon final stage
wasn't super motivated to make a lot of new tilesets for this, hence a bunch of OP reuses too
gotta get a rotating monitor to solve this shit
I should probably get around to properly finish ponder at some point instead of booting it up, looking at something for 10 minutes then giving up and playing the chess avoidance
i'd say only playing the chess avoidance is a completely legitimate and understandable approach to playing ponder
Ok Windows I remember that there's a combination of Keys which you can rotate the screen 45 degrees
i fail to understand how 45 degrees would work
45 lets you see two orientations in kind of a good way
You can put It sideways or upsidedown
there is a upside down ledge
yeah that one took me a while to spot
yeah it was sneaky like that
do you still have access to your previous abilities/powerups?
Water but Newton doesn't would very proud.
nah this is cruise 6 islands EX
I wanna ponder cruising the six islands
gimmick L needle is the future people aren't ready for
this is a critical mistake that will cost him top 3
i somehow get the feeling thats not the intended way
its an understandable lack of clarity that i probably need to address though
that's one way to do that i guess
wow that was also the wrong way to have gone about it
wait, does that mean you could skip on the left path ?
Well It was nice yo be here but I gotta go, bye =D
if you stack water, is it additive or multiplicative
does 2 water3 make water6 or water9
you're the one with all the tubs of water cosmo
well hang on, 2 of those were water
one of them was vinegar and the other was vegetable oil
I find it a bit confusing that in this stage you don't see how many water things you have
no that's probably a bug i never noticed
you don't until like the very end, pretty sure it's a bug
yeah one is probably draw gui and one is draw and i just never noticed
because it worked in the other stage
why is there one at the top left corner btw
Breaking: local streamer opts to jump cancel instead of figuring out the intended strats. more at 11.
what i meant was, there's a "blue thing" at the top left corner
that used to be 4 spikes but it was uncomfortably hard even with the water so figured giving people that option was okay
o it's too high in the screen lol
oh you're right it goes down
time for my favorite gimmick screen
and i'm not talking about the board game
cosmo is talking about the japanese prefix "go" meaning after
i walked three floors and points startet accumulating again
i would say i do tend towards checkpoints so that's fair, but it didn't seem long or hard enough to warrant it
okay this is the issue i have with this boss
i know hyo-ka also quit due to it
beacuse you might not realize they do taht
yeah okay i can see how that gets confusing, thats due to a later change i made
that's sort of sloppy testing on my part since its only confusing when things go wrong
oh well, definitely on the to fix list
that was a weirdly anticlimactic end
yeah they get really big by the end, and if you die to them now they kind of go out of control so its not clear exactly what happens
but that's due to a change i made after all the testers so oops
glad you liked it, was a fun break to make this
now its just a matter of finishing the actual huge adventure
